data.actual_result: You quickly get undeafened and deafened again. You must use your Mute keybind to undeafen.(Some times it will work correctly depending on the timing of pressing keys...)
data.expected_result: You undeafen and still are muted (or if you didn't mute first, you are unmuted)
data.short_description: When using Shift+Ctrl+(Key) and Ctrl+(Key) to mute/deafen causes deafen to become stuck
data.steps_to_repro: - Set a mute keybind to Ctrl+p(any key works) - Set a Deafen keybind to Ctrl+Shift+p - Enter any voice channel - Use Ctrl+p to mute (or don't) -Then use Ctrl+Shift+p to deafen - Use it again to undeafen
